mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDDATE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDHIT, USERNAME, BOARDREF, BOARDSTEP, BOARDDEPTH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, sysdate, #{boardContents}, 0, #{userName}, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL,0,0)

INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDDATE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDHIT, USERNAME, BOARDREF, BOARDSTEP, BOARDDEPTH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, sysdate, #{boardContents}, 0, #{userName}, #{boardRef},#{boardStep},#{boardDepth})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET BOARDSTEP=BOARDSTEP+1 WHERE BOARDREF=#{boardRef} AND BOARDSTEP>#{boardStep}
UPDATE QNA SET BOARDHIT=BOARDHIT+1 WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
